original_title: Gloria Estefan – Into the Light World Tour
overview: Nine countries… 100 cities… millions of fans... and they've been waiting! Capture live over a two-night period in May, 1991 at the Ahoy Arena in Holland, Gloria Estefan Into the Light World Tour is one of the most elaborate, spectacular concert productions ever brought to the screen.
title: Gloria Estefan – Into the Light World Tour
